98年的经典老游戏，可玩性依旧很高，十分推荐。（如果游玩的时候常常闪退的话，可以把你的输入法改为默认的英文，因为这款老游戏不兼容中文输入法）
游戏很经典，但操作有点不顺手（滑溜溜的弗里曼），画质一般般，玩一会会感到头晕。

Не застал сие шедевр прошлого века в своё время и эта игра попала мне в руки лишь в 2021 году. В целом я понимаю за что любят эту игру. Это действительно отличная игра для 98-го года, но в нынешнее время играется она крайне тяжело. Если Вас не гложет чувство ностальгии по этой игре или Вы не играли в эту игру в своё время как я, то лучше будет пройти фанатский ремейк Black Mesa.

I got Half Life: Alyx, so to attempt to properly appreciate the game, I'm playing though all the Half Life games. I will say, the combat and movement can be infuriating. Their idea of more difficulty is throwing as many of the most obnoxious enemies as they can at you, and then also made them bullet sponges. I guess I was playing combat wrong though, I'll give it another play through.

That said, this game REALLY shines for its puzzles! This game is a classic shooter that actually delighted me with the creativity of its puzzles, the attention to detail you need, and the freedom to solve the puzzles in alternative ways. On occasion, I was able to pass a challenge in a way that I don't think the developers intended, but wasn't breaking the game.

When I played through this game, it was something different. The game, for one, makes no clear communication what your next objective is within the game. For me, this was frustrating, but I would imagine others would enjoy the challenge. I ended up using a PDF walkthrough of Half-Life's story in order to beat the game, but now that I think of it, that only lowered my enjoyment of the game in the long run.

Good game but one of the worst last bosses I have ever played in any game. Nothing to do with when it was made; [spoiler] I avoided everything for two to three hours and eventually had to look for help. Turns out you had to get hit by the boss to progress. This is despite the fact you still get a hit marker sound beforehand, so you still think you're doing damage before needing to get hit. Absolutely no sense zero brain cell design [/spoiler]
